title: 9 relationship warning signs you should devote more time to your partner
text:
Being in a relationship shouldn't consume all of your time, and even the healthiest relationships have a few lapses in communication.

But sometimes it can be difficult to tell when you're not investing enough time in a relationship.

If it's a surprise when your partner is feeling anxious or upset about something, and you have no idea what their daily life looks like, you may want to look more deeply into how you're spending your time.

Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories.

With our busy schedules, our career aspirations, and our commitments to family and friends, finding time to devote to our romantic partners can often feel like a challenge. While healthy relationships can certainly withstand the occasional lapse in communication, a serious lack of "quality time" can chip away at the partnership's foundation, weakening bonds and compromising the level of happiness you feel when you're together.

If any of the following nine signs sound familiar, that could be an indication that investing time in your relationship should become a priority.
description: If you have no idea what your partner's daily life looks like, you may need to invest more time in your relationship.
